p:
S1 Fig in the supporting information depicts an exploration on the relative AIC values of a series of candidate models ( AIC
c ( k) − AIC
c ( k
min ), with k ∈ [1, 6]), estimated according to Eq (10). For the majority of the countries, the optimal decomposition consisted of k
min = 2 components, with the exceptions of the Netherlands and Belgium with k
min = 3, and France with k
min = 4. S2, S3, S4, and S5 Figs in the supporting information depict for each country the respective time series of all the emerging k
min components and their symptoms composition. The component selected by our framework is highlighted by a blue square. These results show how our approach is capable of taking into account differences in ILI definition between countries since we can select the components that best correlate with the national ILI signal.
